verbs.description: The man [V: was] seen standing behind the president holding a " Blacks for Trump " sign .
The man was [V: seen] [ARG1: standing behind the president holding a " Blacks for Trump " sign] .
[ARG1: The man] was seen [V: standing] [ARG2: behind the president holding a " Blacks for Trump " sign] .
[ARG0: The man] was seen standing behind the president [V: holding] [ARG1: a " Blacks for Trump " sign] .
